players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Alice, please vote Charlie with me to end this now."

Charlie: "Bob is lying. If he were a real detective he’d stay quiet Day 1 to avoid being night-killed. He’s gambiting to force a misvote. Alice, let’s no-lynch today and hear more before rushing a loss."

You: "Bob, if you’re detective, why claim now with only one mafioso? What if Charlie was town and dies? Charlie, why push no-lynch with 3 alive? Claim your role. Bob, confirm you’re detective and explain N1 choice."

Bob: "Yes, I’m the detective. I outed now because with 3 alive there’s only 1 vote needed wrong to lose. I checked Charlie N1 (Diana died) and he returned mafioso. Charlie, what’s your role? Alice, please vote Charlie."
Charlie: remained silent.

You: "Charlie, full claim now. If you’re town, propose a plan that wins. Bob, lock in your result once more: you investigated Charlie N1 and got mafioso, correct? I’m ready to vote after Charlie’s claim."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Alice, please vote Charlie with me to end this now."

Charlie: "Bob is lying. If he were a real detective he’d stay quiet Day 1 to avoid being night-killed. He’s gambiting to force a misvote. Alice, let’s no-lynch today and hear more before rushing a loss."

Alice: "Bob, if you’re detective, why claim now with only one mafioso? What if Charlie was town and dies? Charlie, why push no-lynch with 3 alive? Claim your role. Bob, confirm you’re detective and explain N1 choice."

You: "Yes, I’m the detective. I outed now because with 3 alive there’s only 1 vote needed wrong to lose. I checked Charlie N1 (Diana died) and he returned mafioso. Charlie, what’s your role? Alice, please vote Charlie."
Charlie: remained silent.

Alice: "Charlie, full claim now. If you’re town, propose a plan that wins. Bob, lock in your result once more: you investigated Charlie N1 and got mafioso, correct? I’m ready to vote after Charlie’s claim."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie

You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.

Alice: "Charlie, full claim now. If you’re town, propose a plan that wins. Bob, lock in your result once more: you investigated Charlie N1 and got mafioso, correct? I’m ready to vote after Charlie’s claim."
